summary: Changes the creepy music in the houses of Raven Rock.
descriptionHtml:
Feb 18: This feature is now included in the Unofficial Dragonborn Patch (ver. 1.0.1), so I recommend downloading the patch instead of this mod.

Download the patch here; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31083

=======================================================================================
Bethesda decided, for some unknown reason, to have the same music playing in the homes of Raven Rock as in Apocrypha and (at least it sounds like it) Castle Volkihar. I don\'t agree with this decision.

This mod changes the music of those houses to be more hospitable and generic, using the same playlist that runs while exploring Solstheim. Not a very dramatic change, but at least I think it\'s a change for the better.

Obviously, you\'ll need the Dragonborn DLC to enjoy this mod. Hope you like it :)
author: saajveh
